title: Hire Tempo Traveller in Delhi on Cheap and Best Price at MyTempoTraveller.com (My Tempo Traveller)
text: By My Tempo Traveller Sep 1, 2015 My Tempo Traveller -> offering Ac and Non Ac Tempo Traveller Hire in Delhi, Luxury Tempo Traveller Booking Delhi, Tempo traveller is used in the travelling for the small family or the business trip purpose in which some company members want to travel for the outing for some days. Hire Tempo traveller rent for package can be quite easy if you make the best decision of hiring the best option available on MyTempoTraveller.com only at the cheap and best price. We have taken care of every details to present and offer to guest top class service at reasonable rates.Delhi is the capital city of India and is also a veritable mirror to the glorious history and rich heritage of the country. This is perfectly exemplified in the numerous forts, temples, museums and other major tourist attractions and places of interest in Delhi that speak of the city's intriguing and glorious past. We offer you information on all major sightseeing attractions, tourist attractions and places of tourist interest in Delhi that are sure to fascinate you with their past legends and striking beauty of their architecture. Come with us to explore these tourist attractions of Delhi and take a memorable trip down the history lane, New Delhi presents a relatively modern picture with Government houses, embassies and other official buildings that are home to several top-level dignitaries. Some of the major tourist attractions of Old Delhi include Purana Quila or Old Fort, Jantar Mantar observatory, Chandni Chowk, Red Fort or Lal Quila and Jama Masjid. There are equally interesting places to see in New Delhi that form an integral part of Delhi tour packages. Parliament House, Rashtrapati Bhawan, Birla Mandir, Akshardham Temple, and Bahai Temple are just a few of the major attractions that are a must visit during your trip to India and a visit to New Delhi. Major shopping attractions in Delhi are: CHANDNI CHOWK: It is a traditional & historic place for shopping since the Mughal era. One can find small shops in the by lanes of the market, which specialize in a particular zone. PARANTHEWALI GALI is famous for delicious paranthas. KATRA NEEL is famous as a cloth bazaar, where one can find Indian silk, muslin, cotton or any other type of fabric. KINARI BAZAAR specializes in famous zari work fit for Indian bridal trousseau. DARIBA KALAN is known for gold and silver shopping. also book online hotels in india and Golden Triangle Tour Packages Many more streets/by lanes offer much more. About the Author
